item.name: Trap Current Critical
item.description: Current has exceeded the breaker rating level. The addition of any new load could overload or trip the breaker

item.name: Trap Current Warning
item.description: Current has reached the rating level for this breaker, the addition of any new load could overload or trip the breaker

item.name: Trap Load Critical
item.description: The rated capacity of the breaker has been exceeded. There is a high risk of tripping the breaker

item.name: Trap Load Warning
item.description: Load has reached the rating level for this breaker, the addition of any new load could overload or trip the breaker

item.name: Trap PDU Communication Lost
item.description: Connection between the daisy-chained PDUs is lost.

item.name: Trap Total Heat Critical
item.description: The heat created by the load attached to this PDU has exceeded the set threshold

item.name: Trap Total Heat Warning
item.description: The heat created by the load attached to this PDU has reached a threshold

item.name: Trap Total Load Critical
item.description: The rated capacity of the PDU has been exceeded. There is a risk of tripping the branch circuit protection

item.name: Trap Total Load Warning
item.description: The rated capacity for PDU has reached the rating level. There is a risk of tripping the branch circuit protection

item.name: Trap Total Power Critical
item.description: The rated capacity of the PDU has been exceeded. There is a risk of tripping the branch circuit protection

item.name: Trap Total Power Warning
item.description: The rated capacity for PDU has reached rating level. There is a risk of tripping the branch circuit protection

item.name: Trap Voltage High Critical
item.description: The PDU has detected an input line voltage that is more than 20% ABOVE the expected voltage

item.name: Trap Voltage High Warning
item.description: The PDU has detected an input line voltage that is more than 10% ABOVE the expected voltage

item.name: Trap Voltage Low Critical
item.description: The PDU has detected a very low input line voltage more than 20% BELOW the expected voltage, or the breaker may have tripped.

item.name: Trap Voltage Low Warning
item.description: The PDU has detected an input line voltage that is more than 10% BELOW the expected voltage

trigger.name: Current Critical on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Current has exceeded the breaker rating level. The addition of any new load could overload or trip the breaker

dependency.name: Pas de donnes sur le statut de {HOST.NAME} pendant plus de 3 minutes.
